disk.VirtualDiskBlock

  • Packages that use VirtualDiskBlock 
    Package Description
    disk  

    • Uses of VirtualDiskBlock in disk

      Methods in disk with parameters of type VirtualDiskBlock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DiskUtils.copyCharToBlock(VirtualDiskBlock vdb, int index, char c)
      Copies a Character to a VirtualDiskBlock.
      static void DiskUtils.copyIntToBlock(VirtualDiskBlock vdb, int index, int value)
      Copy an integer value into four consecutive bytes in a block.
      static void DiskUtils.copyNextBNToBlock(VirtualDiskBlock vdb, int value)
      Copies the Integer f=given to the last four bytes of the VirtualDiskBlock.
      static char DiskUtils.getCharFromBlock(VirtualDiskBlock vdb, int index)
      Returns a Character from the given VirtualDiskBlock.
      static int DiskUtils.getIntFromBlock(VirtualDiskBlock vdb, int index)
      Extracts an integer value from four consecutive bytes in a block.
      static int DiskUtils.getNextBNFromBlock(VirtualDiskBlock vdb)
      Gets the next block number from a given block.
      void DiskUnit.read(int blockNum, VirtualDiskBlock b)
      Reads a block from the DiskUnit, given by blockNum.
      static void DiskUtils.showVirtualDiskBlock(int b, VirtualDiskBlock block)
      Shows the contents (characters) of a block.
      void DiskUnit.write(int blockNum, VirtualDiskBlock b)
      Writes the content of a VirtualDiskBlock into the corresponding block in the DiskUnit given by blockNum.
